thread.title: African migrants injured in Italian drive-by shootings: police

title: African migrants injured in Italian drive-by shootings: police
text:
African migrants injured in Italian drive-by shootings: police 12:09am IST - 00:42 
Video uploaded on social media website shows the site where an Italian man was arrested after drive-by shootings in Macerata. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
